title: IRenderMaterial.FixedAspectRatio
description: Gets or sets whether the aspect ratio is fixed for mapping this appearance texture.
returns: True if the aspect ratio is fixed, false if not
remarks:
When FixedAspect is true, then the image is uniformly scaled when either the
height
or
width
is changed.
Use this property when changing the height or width of an appearance texture and wanting it uniformly scaled.
